home.title: Developer Toolkit
home.subtitle: A collection of practical tools for developers and technical professionals
home.description: Including encryption/decryption, data conversion, code generation and other practical tools

token-generator.title: Token Generator
token-generator.description: Generate random strings using the characters you want, uppercase or lowercase letters, numbers and/or symbols.

hash-text.title: Hash Text
hash-text.description: Hash text strings using desired functions: MD5, SHA1, SHA256, SHA224, SHA512...

bcrypt.title: Bcrypt
bcrypt.description: Hash and compare text strings using bcrypt. Bcrypt is a password hashing function based on the Blowfish cipher...

uuids-generator.title: UUIDs Generator
uuids-generator.description: A Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) is a 128-bit number used to identify information in computer systems.

ulid-generator.title: ULID Generator
ulid-generator.description: Generate random Universally Unique Lexicographically Sortable Identifiers (ULID)

encrypt-decrypt-text.title: Encrypt/Decrypt Text
encrypt-decrypt-text.description: Encrypt and decrypt text plaintext using encryption algorithms (such as AES, TripleDES, Rabbit or RC4).

bip39-generator.title: BIP39 Passphrase Generator
bip39-generator.description: Generate BIP39 passphrases from existing or random mnemonics, or get mnemonics from passphrases.

hmac-generator.title: HMAC Generator
hmac-generator.description: Compute Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) using keys and hash-based hash algorithms.

rsa-key-pair-generator.title: RSA Key Pair Generator
rsa-key-pair-generator.description: Generate new random RSA private and public key pem certificates.

password-strength-analyzer.title: Password Strength Analyzer
password-strength-analyzer.description: Use this password strength analyzer and crack time estimation tool to discover password strength.

tokenGenerator.title: Token Generator
tokenGenerator.description: Generate secure random tokens with customizable options
tokenGenerator.errorMessage: Please select at least one character type

bcrypt.title: Bcrypt
bcrypt.description: Hash and compare passwords using bcrypt. Bcrypt is a secure password hashing function based on the Blowfish cipher.

hashText.title: Hash Text
hashText.description: Hash text using common digest functions: MD5, SHA1, SHA256, SHA224, SHA512, SHA384, SHA3, RIPEMD160

uuidsGenerator.title: UUIDs Generator
uuidsGenerator.description: A universally unique identifier (UUID) is a 128-bit number used to identify information in computer systems. The number of possible UUIDs is 16^32, which is 2^128 or about 3.4x10^38 (which is a very large number!).
uuidsGenerator.name: Name

ulidGenerator.title: ULID Generator
ulidGenerator.description: Generate random machine-readable universally unique lexicographically sortable identifiers (ULID).

encryptDecryptText.title: Encrypt/Decrypt Text
encryptDecryptText.description: Encrypt and decrypt text using various algorithms (like AES, TripleDES, Rabbit, RC4).

bip39Generator.title: BIP39 Passphrase Generator
bip39Generator.description: Generate BIP39 mnemonic passphrases from existing entropy or random generation, or get entropy from mnemonic for help.

hmacGenerator.title: HMAC Generator
hmacGenerator.description: Generate Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) using your preferred hashing algorithm.
hmacGenerator.plainText: Plain text to compute the hash
hmacGenerator.plainTextPlaceholder: Plain text to compute the hash...

rsaKeyPairGenerator.title: RSA Key Pair Generator
rsaKeyPairGenerator.description: Generate new and secure RSA key pairs with optional PEM passphrase.
rsaKeyPairGenerator.bitsValidation: Bits should be 256 <= bits <= 16384 and be a multiple of 8

passwordStrengthAnalyzer.title: Password Strength Analyzer
passwordStrengthAnalyzer.description: Use this password strength analyzer and breach time estimation tool to check your password strength.
passwordStrengthAnalyzer.crackDuration: Duration to crack this password with brute force
passwordStrengthAnalyzer.noteText: The computed strength is based on the time it would take to crack the password using a brute force approach, it does not take into account the possibility of a dictionary attack.

dateTimeConverter.invalidDateError: This date is invalid for this format

colorPicker.title: Color Picker
colorPicker.description: Convert colors between different formats (hex, rgb, hsl, hwb, lch, cmyk, named colors)
colorPicker.name: name:

caseConverter.title: Case Converter
caseConverter.description: Convert text between different case formats

textToNatoAlphabet.title: Text to NATO Alphabet
textToNatoAlphabet.description: Convert text to NATO phonetic alphabet for clear oral transmission
textToNatoAlphabet.inputLabel: Your text to convert to NATO phonetic alphabet
textToNatoAlphabet.outputLabel: Your text in NATO phonetic alphabet

textToAsciiBinary.description: Convert text to ASCII binary representation and vice versa

textToAsciiBinary.binaryInputLabel: Enter binary to convert to text
textToAsciiBinary.textOutputPlaceholder: The text representation of your binary will be here

textToUnicode.title: Text to Unicode
textToUnicode.description: Convert text to Unicode entities and vice versa

textToUnicode.unicodeInputLabel: Enter unicode to convert to text
